ing: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen pink lemonade concentrate
1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
6 cups ice cubes, or as desired
des: "This is a great punch for big groups. The cream soda makes it unique, and everyone loves it!"
ins: Mix cream soda, pineapple juice, pink lemonade concentrate, orange juice concentrate, water, and lemon slices together in a punch bowl; add ice.
